data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Salade niçoise  is a salad from the district of Nice. It ____ tomatoes, tuna, hard-boiled ____, ____, ____ anchovies. It ____ dressed ____ a ____. It ____ served ____ or ____ a ____ of ____. The tuna may be cooked or canned.
data.partBlankContent: Salade niçoise  is a salad from the district of Nice. It h__ tomatoes, tuna, hard-boiled eg__, oli___, a__ anchovies. It i_ dressed wi__ a vinai______. It i_ served wi__ or wit____ a b__ of let____. The tuna may be cooked or canned.
data.answer: Salade niçoise 是一种来自尼斯地区的沙拉。有西红柿、金枪鱼、水煮蛋、橄榄和凤尾鱼。用醋汁调味。它可以配生菜，也可以不配。金枪鱼可以煮熟或罐装。
